name: Discovery Kids: Pony Paradise
description:
Now you can have the pony that you've always wanted on your Nintendo DS! Pony Paradise gives you the chance to care for your very own pony from birth to adulthood. Become best friends as you groom, feed and take your pony for rides! Don't forget all those important accessories to make your pony the most stylish in the stables!

Features

• 4 different realistic pony breeds to care for
• Play in 5 different 3D environments: meadow, forest, circus, pony school and stables
• Collect over 60 unique items to customize your pony
